description: Text History as a Research Tool on Literary Development in the Books of Kings: The Case of 1 Kings 17-19 in the Masoretic Text and Septuagint Francesca Stavrakopoulou, University of Exeter Ideological Dynamics in Kings: Identity and Religious Practice
title: Text History as a Research Tool on Literary Development in the Books of Kings: The Case of 1 Kings 17-19 in the Masoretic Text and Septuagint
